actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to grant a surviving annuitant the right to elect within 1 year after remarriage whether such annuitant's new spouse shall be entitled, if otherwise qualified, to a survivor's annuity upon the annuitant's death.

summary.text: Grants a surviving annuitant of a Federal employee under the civil service retirement system the right to elect within one year after remarriage whether such annuitant's new spouse shall be entitled, if otherwise qualified, to a survivor's annuity upon the annuitant's death. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8339 (j); 8341 (b)(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to grant a surviving annuitant the right to elect within 1 year after remarriage whether such annuitant's new spouse shall be entitled, if otherwise qualified, to a survivor's annuity upon the annuitant's death.
